Desc.eng: It must be a cruel joke of the Tormentors. What the hell a mortal is doing here?
So much evil would even make my father stand in awe.
We want to smuggle some flesh back to the Titan, to make her stronger, so we could try to break out of this prison before the next harvest. If she makes it, we make it too.
I want to get to the root of this macabre tale. What's next?
Not my pound of flesh. Sorry.
Kill the Tormentors and obtain a Meat Cleaver to cut chunks of flesh from the spikes. Then throw the chunks into the Feeders. We will arrange the rest.
Just passing through to pay a visit to a "friend".
Before your inevitable death, you could do us a service.
As you may know, this place was built eons ago to imprison the Titans. One is still alive and suffering in the nether regions. See those spikes?
With the huge chunks of meat pinned to them?
The Tormentors harvest the flesh of the Titan every few centuries to keep him weak. And it's displayed here to make us suffer. We can't die, but remain starving, as the meat is protected by a curse.
Are you offer me the honorable task of collecting Titan flesh?
Only mortals can touch it. Another sadistic jest by the Tormentors.
